page.title: 15TYPICAL FAMILY W'END (CONT)
page.content: 15.00 Go to Bridlington and rent a video film. 15.15 Arrive home. 15.20 Watch the rented video film. 17.00 Have tea. 18.00 We go to Rachel's house and watch television. 21.00 We have supper. 21.30 Watch television. 22.00 We go to bed - Nicola sleeping at Rachel's house. Sunday Morning. 09.45 We get up and get dressed. 10.00 Breakfast-time. 10.30 We play with computer games. 11.30 We take the dogs for a walk 12.00 Lunchtime. 12.30 We go to visit Nicola's grandparents. 13.30 Drive to Bridlington to return rented video film. 14.00 Family goes for bicycle ride.
